title: The Devil’s Origin - Novel Updates
tags: Aggressive Characters   Bestiality   Caring Protagonist   Childish Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Demon Lord   Fantasy Creatures   Futanari   Game Elements   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Humanoid Protagonist   Monsters   Mpreg   Outdoor Interc**rse   Polyandry   R-18   R*pe   Shota   System Administrator   Tentacles   Threesome   Torture   Transported to Another World   Vampires
author: Yayoi   弥生
description:
When I woke up, I became the Demon King!?

It’s my responsibility as the Demon King to increase the monster population, and the only way to do that is to mate with as many monsters as I can...

This is the beginning of my life as a monster-making Demon King.>
